description:
The Blindfold Gang consists of teenagers who each posses special abilities in their own eyes. Their base is the former house of Tateyama family.
The 3 main group members Kano, Seto and Kido were adopted by Tateyama family and made the gang after encouragement of the family`s daughter, Ayano. Ayano became the leader, but after her mysterious death, Kido took the leadership.
The group seems to be all about finding more members who posses eye abilities, recruiting them and helping them to control their powers. But their main goal is to find the truth behind their powers, what triggers people to show it and what happened to "lost people".
name: Mekakushi-Dan
